mapper.select:
select c.*, Person.cPersonName, cs.suppliername, cs.sum, Department.cDepName, PurchaseType.cPTName from cy_inquiry c left join [UFDATA_001_2015].[dbo].Person on Person.cPersonCode = c.fd_applicant left join [UFDATA_001_2015].[dbo].Department on Department.cDepCode = c.fd_apply_department left join [UFDATA_001_2015].[dbo].PurchaseType on PurchaseType.cPTCode = c.fd_apply_purtype left join (select s.ID, suppliername=(stuff((SELECT ',' + suppliername FROM cy_supplier WHERE ID = s.ID FOR xml path ('')), 1, 1, '')), count(s.suppliername) sum from cy_supplier s GROUP BY s.ID) cs on c.fd_no = cs.ID where Person.cPersonName = #{cPersonName} and c.fd_status is null
and c.fd_id = #{fd_id}
mapper.update: update cy_inquiry set fd_modificatio_person=#{fd_modificatio_person}, fd_modificatio_time =getdate(), fd_supplier_name=#{fd_supplier_name}, fd_supplier_code=#{fd_supplier_code}, fd_bid_opentime=#{fd_bid_opentime}, fd_bid_closetime=#{fd_bid_closetime}, fd_edit=#{fd_edit}, fd_status=#{fd_status} where fd_id = #{fd_id}

update cy_inquiry_detailed set fd_supplier_name=#{fd_supplier_name}, fd_supplier_code=#{fd_supplier_code}, fd_bid_opentime=#{fd_bid_opentime}, fd_bid_closetime=#{fd_bid_closetime}, fd_status=#{fd_status}, fd_remarks=#{fd_remarks} where fd_id = #{fd_id}
mapper.select: select c.*, cs.suppliername, cs.sum, ci.fd_edit from cy_inquiry_detailed c left join cy_inquiry ci on c.fd_id = ci.fd_id left join (select s.ID, suppliername=(stuff((SELECT ',' + suppliername FROM cy_supplier WHERE ID = s.ID FOR xml path ('')), 1, 1, '')), count(s.suppliername) sum from cy_supplier s GROUP BY s.ID) cs on c.fd_id = cs.ID where fd_parent_id = #{fd_parent_id} and c.fd_status is null
select max(substring(fd_apply_no, 10, 6)) as aa from cy_order where convert(varchar(10), fd_creat_time, 120) = convert(varchar(10), getdate(), 120)
mapper.insert: insert into cy_order (fd_id, fd_inquiryid, fd_no, fd_apply_no, fd_applicant, fd_creat_time, fd_apply_time, fd_apply_department, fd_apply_bustype, fd_apply_purtype, fd_bid_opentime, fd_bid_closetime, fd_supplier_name, fd_supplier_code, fd_quotation_tatus) values (#{fd_id}, #{fd_inquiryid}, #{fd_no}, #{fd_apply_no}, #{fd_applicant}, #{fd_creat_time}, #{fd_apply_time}, #{fd_apply_department}, #{fd_apply_bustype}, #{fd_apply_purtype}, #{fd_bid_opentime}, #{fd_bid_closetime}, #{fd_supplier_name}, #{fd_supplier_code}, #{fd_quotation_tatus})
